ygData.subject: Re: the other undead knight
ygData.msgSnippet: As for the boots, I think it s 2 boots. A right and a left boot (cause I have the right boot) X. Princess Xaera Dark Princess of Hate High Priestess of
ygData.messageBody:
As for the boots, I think it's 2 boots.

A right and a left boot (cause I have the "right" boot)

X.

Princess Xaera
Dark Princess of Hate
High Priestess of Innoruuk

>From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>ok, after a truly harrowing adventure in the now-deserted dungeon of najena
>(the details of which i will get into further, lets just say i had more
>near-death experiences in a one hour period than i've ever had before) i
>confirmed that the other undead knight is in drelzna's room. and he has
>quests for the gauntlets, greaves, and boots.
>
>btw, the crusaders seem to be rarer than good barbra streisand songs, and
>the decayed doesnt even always drop. while the enchanter quest silvered
>guards ALWAYS spawn, and they virtually always have the quest item. what
>the
>HELL is going on here?
>
>and for those who want, the fabulous SPOILER INFO below
>

>here goes:
>
>gauntlets: decayed gauntlets + 1 enchanted platinum bar
>
>greaves: 2 decayed legplates (left and right i assume) + 2 melatite from
>gnomes in solusek mining co
>
>boots: decayed boots + 2 faerie dust
>
>
>Beld Demonblade
